title: Continuation and more lights o
author: verias
text:
Cameos: Marius Hjelseth and Anthony Cardno

Hidden Names: Red

So, we have more lights going out, and some kind of board game action taking place between Kludge and the Surgeon.

I wonder what kind of game and rules we might be able to conjure based solely on what we can see here?

Regards,

Keith W.

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: It's called Chor capturing pieces cause them to explode. Michael Bay approved.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: An explosive board game? They must be having a blast!
